createPolyLine

public java.lang.Object createPolyLine(double[] x,
                                       double[] y,
                                       boolean closed)
Creates a GeneralPath instance. Note that though the parameter coordinates are doubles, GeneralPath uses floats internally.

Parameters:
x - array of X-coordinates
y - array of Y-coordinates
closed - closed or open

Parameters:
x - array of X-coordinates
y - array of Y-coordinates
pointTypes - array of point types

createText

public java.lang.Object createText(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   java.lang.String text,
                                   java.awt.Font font)
Creates an empty text shape. The returned shape must be additionally filled, when displayed.

Parameters:
x - coordinate
y - coordinate
text - text to set
font - the font to use for geometry generation

createHatch

public java.lang.Object createHatch(java.awt.Shape shape)
Creates an area instance for the parameter shape. It is up to the eventual renderer to display it filled.

Parameters:
shape - a shape to fill
